title: Search Blog 2017 - Nirvana Naturopathy & Retreat
author: Nirvana Naturopathy; Retreat Center
cleaned_text: There is a huge craze right now about clean eating and staying fit. Hotels are trying to cash in on this and therefore, advertising themselves as 'wellness hotels' to attract fitness enthusiasts. But, there is a clear difference between a wellness hotel and a wellness center. Read on to
